name: Man Across River
description:
Play in Fullscreen for the best experience! About:

This is a short game, which focuses on the movement of you and your sword(s). Use the crazy physics as an advantage and maybe you can even beat our time ? :D

Movement: 
  • WASD / Arrow key
  • Mouse
  • T -> Show Time
  • H -> Reset  full game
Lore: I don't like the Man Across River and cannot reach him. Maybe we can get random swords around here and see them Joined Together to sweep him! :D
- Slime More:

Code and assets are selfmade and are free to use :D 
Everything is open source at: https://github.com/wladi0097/ManAcrossRiver

Enjoy the game,
Wlad & Stas
